| A pit bull:* has no hands.
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* can be [tamed by feeding](/wiki/Domestic "Domestic").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* does not appear in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom"). |                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line421](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line421 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A **pit bull** is a [domestic](/wiki/Domestic "Domestic") monster added in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). It is similar to a [large dog](/wiki/Large_dog "Large dog"), but considerably stronger.

## Strategy

While having a stronger dog is nice, by the time these animals appear you will probably want an even better pet. Like most domestic animals in SLASH'EM, pit bulls are [unable to hurt a large variety of monsters](/wiki/Need_%2Bx_weapon_to_hit "Need +x weapon to hit"), since they hit as a +0 weapon.

They are quite capable however in killing a priest that you might want to keep alive.
html:
Pit bull

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
d pit bull
Difficulty 12
Attacks Bite 4d4
d pit bull
Difficulty 12
Attacks

Bite 4d4

Base level 11
Base experience 241
Speed 15
Base AC 4
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 800
Nutritional value 250
Size Medium
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A pit bull:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is carnivorous.
  • can be tamed by feeding.
  • is strong.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line421

A pit bull is a domestic monster added in SLASH'EM. It is similar to a large dog, but considerably stronger.

Strategy

While having a stronger dog is nice, by the time these animals appear you will probably want an even better pet. Like most domestic animals in SLASH'EM, pit bulls are unable to hurt a large variety of monsters, since they hit as a +0 weapon.

They are quite capable however in killing a priest that you might want to keep alive.

A '''pit bull''' is a [[domestic]] monster added in [[SLASH'EM]].  It is similar to a [[large dog]], but considerably stronger.
==Strategy==
While having a stronger dog is nice, by the time these animals appear you will probably want an even better pet.  Like most domestic animals in SLASH'EM, pit bulls are [[Need +x weapon to hit|unable to hurt a large variety of monsters]], since they hit as a +0 weapon.

They are quite capable however in killing a priest that you might want to keep alive.
